overview: Ricky Spanish can't take his eyes off of his new stepmom Ryan Conner, but she couldn't be more annoyed to have him around - especially since she has an important shoot today. Ryan tells Ricky to stay out of the way while she shoots porn in the living room. When there's an issue with the male talent, the director swaps in Ricky in his place. Luckily for Ricky, the first rule of show business is that the show must go on!
title: Lil Humpers 7
